<title level="1" right="Focus 1" pfs="Standard">[Angelic Halo](/Spells.aspx?ID=494)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Aura" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=206" />
<trait label="Good" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=83" />
<trait label="Sorcerer" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=148" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 402 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Bloodline**
[Angelic](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=2)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Single Action" /></row>
<row>[verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Area** 15-foot emanation

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You gain an angelic halo with an aura that increases allies' healing from the [_heal_](/Spells.aspx?ID=148) spell. Allies in your halo's emanation who are healed by a _heal_ spell gain a status bonus to Hit Points regained equal to double the _heal_ spell's level.
name: Angelic Halo
